attributes.action: Allow Widows to put the childs fathers name on the birth certificate without all the red tape
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that widows cannot put the father of their child on the birth certificate without haveing to go through a whole government procedure and red tape with no guarentee at the end of it. 

Surely the widows of this country have been through enough with the loss of their loved ones without having to go through the heart wrenching court procedures just to name the father of their child on a birth certificate. 

Have some humanity on the subject please, not everyone in this world wants to commit fraud. There are DNA tests that can be carried to determine if the father of the child is who they say it is.....

Please help me out here and stop this completely unneccessary heart break.
